00032   const char *RangeServerProtocol::m_command_strings[] = {
00033     "load range",
00034     "update",
00035     "create scanner",
00036     "fetch scanblock",
00037     "compact",
00038     "status",
00039     "shutdown",
00040     "dump stats",

00051   const char *RangeServerProtocol::command_text(short command) {
00052     if (command < 0 || command >= COMMAND_MAX)
00053       return "UNKNOWN";
00054     return m_command_strings[command];
00055   }
00056 
00057   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log, RangeState &range_state) {
00058     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00059     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length() + range.encoded_length() + encoded_length_str16(transfer_log) + range_state.encoded_length());
00060     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE);
00061     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00062     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00063     encode_str16(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address(), transfer_log);
00064     range_state.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00065     return cbuf;
00066   }
00067 
00068   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_update(TableIdentifier &table, StaticBuffer &buffer) {
00069     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00070     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length(), buffer);
00071     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_UPDATE);
00072     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00073     return cbuf;
00074   }

00076   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_create_scanner(TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, ScanSpec &scan_spec) {
00077     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00078     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length() + range.encoded_length() + scan_spec.encoded_length());
00079     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER);
00080     table.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00081     range.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00082     scan_spec.encode(cbuf->get_data_ptr_address());
00083     return cbuf;
00084   }

00086   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_destroy_scanner(int scanner_id) {
00087     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER, scanner_id);
00088     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 6);
00089     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER);
00090     cbuf->append_i32(scanner_id);
00091     return cbuf;
00092   }
00093 
00094   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_fetch_scanblock(int scanner_id) {
00095     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER, scanner_id);
00096     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 6);
00097     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK);
00098     cbuf->append_i32(scanner_id);
00099     return cbuf;
00100   }

00103     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);

00131   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_replay_begin(uint16_t group) {
00132     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00133     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 4);
00134     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_REPLAY_BEGIN);
00135     cbuf->append_i16(group);
00136     return cbuf;

00141     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length() + range.encoded_length() + range_state.encoded_length());

00163   CommBuf *RangeServerProtocol::create_request_drop_range(TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range) {
00164     HeaderBuilder hbuilder(Header::PROTOCOL_HYPERTABLE_RANGESERVER);
00165     CommBuf *cbuf = new CommBuf(hbuilder, 2 + table.encoded_length() + range.encoded_length());
00166     cbuf->append_i16(COMMAND_DROP_RANGE);
